name: MITING SIMULATOR
description:
The miting simulator will make you feel like a revolutionary without leaving your home. Your task is to capture all the squares and raise flags with slogans over them. The squares are guarded by armed militants. Kill all the militants, free up the squares. Then raise the flag over the square. In total, you need to capture 7 squares to win.
To complete the task you have 6 types of different weapons.

  • 1 beautiful map
  • 6 types of weapons
  • Advanced AI
